verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How marvelous! How wonderful
And my song shall ever be
O, how marvelous! How wonderful
Is my Savior's love for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let there be singing, let there be joy,
Let the be praising in the house of the Lord.
Let there be singing, rejoice, rejoice.
We're builded together.
We're the house of the Lord.
